SELECT sb.basketno AS basketno, sb.productno AS basketProductNo, sb.id AS memberId, sb.basketproductcount AS basketProductCount, m.name AS memberName, m.phonenumber AS memberPhoneNumber, m.email AS memberEmail, m.totalpay AS memberTotalPay, m.grade AS memberGrade, m.joindate AS memberJoinDate, m.address1 AS memberAddress1, m.address2 AS memberAddress2, m.zipcode AS memberZipcode, p.productno AS productNo, p.productname AS productName, p.productcontent AS productContent, p.productimage AS productImage, p.productlocation AS productLocation, p.productopendate AS productOpenDate, p.productclosedate AS productCloseDate, p.productbookmarkcount AS productBookmarkCount, p.productreadcount AS productReadCount, p.productticketcount AS productTicketCount, p.productremainticketcount AS productRemainTicketCount, p.productprice AS productPrice
FROM ShoppingBasket sb JOIN Member m ON sb.id = m.id JOIN Product p ON sb.productno = p.productno WHERE sb.id = #{id} ORDER BY sb.basketno
